required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate and Compare the PK Profiles of Abaloparatide-SC and Abaloparatide-sMTS in a Cohort of Healthy Men and Healthy Women.
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-Label, Randomized, 2-Cohort, 2-Period Crossover Pharmacokinetic Study of Abaloparatide-SC and Abaloparatide-sMTS in Healthy Men and Women

brief_summary.textblock: A study to evaluate and compare the PK profiles of abaloparatide-SC 80 μg and abaloparatide-sMTS 300 μg in a cohort of healthy men and to make a similar evaluation in a cohort of healthy women

detailed_description.textblock: This study aims to evaluate and compare the pharmacokinetic (PK) profiles of abaloparatide-SC 80 μg injected subcutaneously into the periumbilical region of the abdomen, and abaloparatide-sMTS 300 μg applied to the thigh for 5 minutes in a cohort of healthy men and to make a similar evaluation in a cohort of healthy women.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: In each of 2 study periods, subjects received receive either a transdermal patch containing 300 μg abaloparatide for 5 minutes or an injection of abaloparatide SC 80 μg.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Time frame for collection of PK data after each single-dose administration, separated by 48 hours
Time frame for collection of PK data after each single-dose administration, separated by 48 hours
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC) from time 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration (AUC 0-t)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Time frame for collection of PK data after each single-dose administration, separated by 48 hours
primary_outcome.description: AUC from time 0 extrapolated to time infinity (AUC 0-∞)

secondary_outcome.description: Subjects with treatment-emergent AEs and SAEs.

arm_group.description: Abaloparatide-SC injection (Period 1) followed by abaloparatide-sMTS application (Period 2). Abaloparatide-SC is a drug-device combination product consisting of abaloparatide, an active synthetic peptide analog of parathyroid hormone related peptide (PTHrP), administered to the periumbilical region via an injection pen. Abaloparatide-sMTS is a drug-device combination product consisting of abaloparatide coated onto a microstructure array for transdermal administration of abaloparatide.
Abaloparatide-sMTS (Period 1) application followed by Abaloparatide-SC injection (Period 2).

intervention.description: Single-dose administration of abaloparatide 300 μg applied to the thigh for 5 minutes
Single-dose administration of abaloparatide 80 μg subcutaneous injection to the periumbilical region of the abdomen
